summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning amending sections 27.1, 27.8 and 28.4 of the Zoning Ordinance (86300) to authorize the refund of certain application fees by the Hearing Examiner; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1976 Budget of the Municipal Court in connection therewith; making an appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency therefor.
